SELECT COUNT(*) = 1 FROM publish_sign_in, teacher_select_course WHERE teacher_select_course.t_id = #{tId} AND teacher_select_course.c_id = #{cId} AND publish_sign_in.tsc_id = teacher_select_course.tsc_id AND s_stop_time >= NOW() LIMIT 1

SELECT ps_id AS psId, s_start_time AS startTime, s_late_time AS lateTime, s_stop_time AS stopTime FROM student_select_course, publish_sign_in, teacher_select_course WHERE student_select_course.s_id = #{sId} AND teacher_select_course.c_id = #{cId} AND student_select_course.tsc_id = teacher_select_course.tsc_id AND publish_sign_in.tsc_id = teacher_select_course.tsc_id AND s_stop_time >= NOW()

SELECT s_start_time AS startTime, ss_mark AS signMark FROM teacher_select_course, publish_sign_in, student_sign_in WHERE teacher_select_course.c_id = #{cId} AND publish_sign_in.tsc_id = teacher_select_course.tsc_id AND student_sign_in.ps_id = publish_sign_in.ps_id AND student_sign_in.s_id = #{sId} ORDER BY s_start_time DESC

SELECT ss_id AS ssId, student.s_id AS sId, s_img_src AS sImgSrc, s_name AS sName, ss_time AS signTime, ss_mark AS signMark FROM student_sign_in, student WHERE ps_id = #{psId} AND student.s_id = student_sign_in.s_id AND ss_status = #{status} ORDER BY student.s_id
